segments.text: Aha , Fitness Consultant . Very good , Don't you know about the rules in this office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Ma'am . No magazines during the office hours . I'm sorry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , don't do this again next time . What is it about , anyway ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is about sports for white-collar workers , people like you and me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aerobic sports , for example , jogging , yoga , skating ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Interesting . What were you reading just now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Stretching exercise after sitting a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I have my magazine back now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . It's confiscated for now . And I will return it to you after I finish reading it .
segments.speaker: S1
